data.name: 迷雾回生 Demo
data.detailed_description:
• Mist Slayer is a 3rd person 3D action Roguelite game.
  • You play as a time traveler summoned by the god of the mist world to defeat evil invaders.
  • You can play different characters with distinctive fighting styles.
  • Each run is randomly generated with different levels, enemies, collectable power-ups and items.
  • The game supports 4 players to play online. You can play with your friends, or on your own.

DEFEAT ENEMIES IN THE MIST


3D Action Combat - All characters have their own unique attacks and special moves. Dodge, block, parry...Use your beautiful combos to defeat evil enemies in the mist.

UNLEASH THE POWER OF ELEMENTS


Various Builds - Collect hundreds of different elements powers and items to create your unique combination.

START AN ADVENTURE WITH YOUR FRIENDS


Co-Op Mode - Play solo or with up to three friends in online co-op. Experience the strategy and fun of teamwork.

EXPLORE THE MISTVERSE


Unlock and Upgrade - Unlock new characters and upgrade them. Explore the mist world to find more new collections.


Game Contents:
  • 3 different playable characters
  • 4 chapters with at least 20 random generated levels
  • 10+ Bosses and many different enemies
  • 150+ Powers, runes, items and weapons
  • Rich story and side quests
  • We will keep updating more!

data.short_description: Mist Slayer is an action Roguelite game. You play as a time traveler with unique weapons and skills, fighting against different kinds of enemies in parallel universes, collecting various power-ups, and exploring the world. You can play with your friends, or on your own.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • DirectX: Version 11
